doc:
Steve Railsback https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Steve_Railsback 0 Stephen Hall Railsback (born November 16, 1945) is an American theatre, film, and television actor, born in Dallas, Texas. He is best known for his performances in the films The Stunt Man and his portrayal of Charles Manson in the television miniseries Helter Skelter. Stephen_Hall_Railsback ( born November_16_,_1945 ) is an_American_theatre , film , and television_actor , born in Dallas , Texas . He is_best_known for his_performances in the_films The_Stunt_Man and his_portrayal of Charles_Manson in the_television_miniseries_Helter_Skelter .
